casebody.data:
CITY OF DETROIT and the Detroit Water and Sewerage Department, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
CITY OF HIGHLAND PARK, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158260
COA: 343405 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 4, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the July 19, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
